https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jdTlmo89rlhuqxJk54keSGD916I.jpg Most of us know Billy Graham as the self-assured and charismatic preacher who became one of the most important figures of 20th Century Christianity. Now, with the release of Billy: The Early Years, we meet Billy as the earnest and promising young man at the crossroads of faith and doubt, ultimately facing the moment of decision that launched one of historyâ€™s most powerful evangelistic careers.
